DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effects of arabinoxylan-oligosaccharides (AXOS) on the colonic metabolism and microbial composition, and to compare these effects with the reference prebiotic fructo-oligosaccharide enriched inulin.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Arabinoxylan-Oligosaccharides Compared to Other Prebiotics in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: healthy 1845 years regular eating pattern gastrointestinal complaints antibiotic intake medication influencing gut transit or microbiota abdominal surgery pregnancy
